mapper.sql: id, gameType, isHong, roomid, sevenDouble, ma, zimo, xiayu, addWordCard, name, createTime, cardNumb
mapper.select:
select id
from roominfo where roomid = #{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(id) from roominfo where createTime > #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.insert: insert into roominfo (id, gameType, isHong, roomid, sevenDouble, ma, zimo, xiayu, addWordCard, name, createTime, cardNumb) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gametype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ishong,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sevendouble,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ma,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zimo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{xiayu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addwordcard,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cardNumb,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update roominfo
gameType = #{gametype,jdbcType=CHAR},
